ygData.subject: Question?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, Quick question for ya all. I was in Unrest and someone was selling some blood-stained gloves for 40 plat. He said they were great for mages but
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

Quick question for ya all.

I was in Unrest and someone was selling some blood-stained gloves for 40
plat. He said they were great for mages but before I could get the stats on
the gloves my wonderous ISP gave me a swift to the arse and when I returned
the fellow was gone. Anyone out there able to tell me what the stats on the
gloves are? And are they worth the 40 plat? Seems pretty high for some golves.

Thanks for you time,

Mirrin of Nife
